## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G04750](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G04750)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AT VAMP7B, ATVAMP721, VAMP721, VAMP7B</u>
- **Gene Name:** vesicle-associated membrane protein 721, VESICLE-ASSOCIATED MEMBRANE PROTEIN 7B
- **Description:**   vesicle-associated membrane protein 721;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2010642
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
